turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I I would like a grande Caffè Americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any milk in that for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like any milk in that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like any thing else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that would be it for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want a grande hot cafe americano with 2% milk and chocolate syrup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to place this order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your drink has been ordered. It will be ready for pick up shortly at the starbucks on berry street. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message. Enjoy!
